meanings.definition: The state of being askew or crooked.
meanings.sent1: The askewnesses of the picture frame made it look unbalanced.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the askewnesses of the shelf after it fell off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The askewnesses of the painting gave it a quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: The askewnesses of the tree branches created a unique silhouette against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The askewnesses of the table made it wobble whenever someone placed a drink on it.

meanings.definition: The quality of being out of alignment or off-center.
meanings.sent1: The askewnesses of the bookshelf made it difficult to stand upright.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the askewnesses of the picture frame to make it hang straight.
meanings.sent3: The askewnesses of the road sign caused confusion for drivers.
meanings.sent4: The askewnesses of the tower gave it a leaning appearance.
meanings.sent5: The askewnesses of the rug made it a tripping hazard in the hallway.
